subject: Skeleton (Sport)
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Skeleton racer Zach Lund was barred from competition after testing positive for finasteride, a performance-enhancing substance that he argued came into his system through a hair-loss medication.
snippet: Skeleton racer Zach Lund was barred from competition after testing positive for finasteride, a performance-enhancing substance that he argued came into his system through a hair-loss medication.
